== In The Press ==

=== Introduction ===

This page is dedicated to cataloguing the MyanmarTeam in the press. This page will show you '''how we do things to happen'''. How we contribute to Myanmar Ubuntu User Community.
=== Journal ===

<nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/MyanmarTeam | Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team]]</nowiki> was featured in <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/search?q=site%3Amyanmarinternetjournal.com+ubuntu |Internet Journal]]</nowiki>, Vol:12,No.41 October 27 Edition in the Extreme Geek Section.

The detail of the interview with Burmese Language can be found <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/bonepyae/sets/72157627994634638/ | here]]</nowiki>.
